data.message:
Merge pull request #11 from PickNikRobotics/remove-stamp-from-twist

use only Twist not TwistStamped

data.author: Alex Moriarty
data.message:
use only Twist not TwistStamped

- This removes the TwistStamped. The Stamp information was unused.
- This makes it easier to use with teleop_twist_joy
- In the future we plan to add a TwistStamped version which can be configured

Signed-off-by: Alex Moriarty <alex.moriarty@picknik.ai>

data.author: Alex Moriarty
data.message:
twist_controller -> picknik_twist_controller (#3)

* twist_controller -> picknik_twist_controller

1. prefix twist_controller with picknik_twist_controller

When we merge twist_controller into ros2_controllers we can depricate
this one and not have naming conflicts as users migrate

* cmake: 3.8 -> 3.16

bump to oldest version used on Ubuntu Focal + ROS 2 Humble
https://www.ros.org/reps/rep-2000.html#humble-hawksbill-may-2022-may-2027

---------

Signed-off-by: Alex Moriarty <alex.moriarty@picknik.ai>

data.author: Alex Moriarty
data.message:
fault_controller -> picknik_reset_fault_controller (#2)

* fault_controller -> picknik_reset_fault_controller

This commit does two things:

1) renames fault_controller to reset_fault_controller
2) prefixes with picknik_

The first change, is to be more specific what this controller is used
for.

The second change is because we want to move this controller into
ros2_controllers and when that is complete we can drop the picknik_ and
depricate this version allowing for a transition period.

---------

Signed-off-by: Alex Moriarty <alex.moriarty@picknik.ai>
Co-authored-by: Anthony Baker <abake48@users.noreply.github.com>

data.author: Alex Moriarty
data.message:
CI: Use script to setup repository ci (#1)

* run the script to setup the repostory CI similar to how
  ros_controllers setus their CI because the goal is to eventually
upstream these there. see https://rtw.stoglrobotics.de/master/use-cases/ros_packages/configure_repository.html
* pre-commit run --all-files
* remove RHEL build jobs they pull from ghcr.io and are failing due to permissions

Signed-off-by: Alex Moriarty <alex.moriarty@picknik.ai>

data.author: Alex Moriarty
data.message:
Repo Move: fault_controller and twist_controller

This commit does 3 things:

1. git filter-repo to move kortex2_controllers into fault_controllers
2. moves twist controller out of fault_controller
3. regex replaces kortex2_controllers to either twist_ or fault_
   controller

Previous commit moved some files using git-extras `git cp` because some
files needed to copied and then manually split

Signed-off-by: Alex Moriarty <alex.moriarty@picknik.ai>

data.author: livanov93
data.message:
Introduce fault controller (#63)

* Add fault controller.

* Prepare for switching

* Fix controller switching and starting.

* Keep servoing mode on startup.

* Don t change servoing mode on deactivation.

* Fix mode switching.

* Move all mode switching into constructor.

* Add fault publisher.

* Read servoing mode in the loop.

* Implement required prettyfing changes.

* Add realtime publisher.

* Add additional debug statement on fault reset.

* Formatting fix.

* Pre-commit on kortex2_controllers and kortex2_driver.

data.author: livanov93
data.message:
Changes after debugging on real hardware (#51)

* Hardcode gripper joint.

* Add debug statements for parameters.

* Disable gripper reading if not used.

* Remove non-used arm status.

* Export twist controller plugin.

* Fix kortex controller plugins.

* Fix build.

* Set initial twist commands to zero.

* Joint from array to string.

* Fix prepare for twist controlller.

* Fix prepare for twist controlller.

* Start streaming controller on default.

* Precommit stuff in bringup package.

* Set internal gripper use as default.

* Remove forced boost disabling.

* Add license for twist controller.

* Add license for hardware interface.

* Fix pre-commit for hardware interface source files.

data.author: livanov93
data.message:
Twist controller - controller part and hardware part (#41)

* Add multi interface controller dependency.

* Introduce per controller flag. Refractor code.

* Code refactoring.

* Reorganize read function.

* Separate gripper and other arm joints.

* Change ip.

* Add actuator count report.

* Add debug statements.

* Add more debug statements.

* Include first pass flag.

* Add part of prepare switch.

* Add basic perform swithc to debug.

* Add multi-interface controller as twist streaming controller.

* Update to the newest ros-control api.

* Add twist controller.

* Code refactoring.

* Finish starting part of perpare switch.

* Implement prepare switch for hand, joint and twist controller.

* Implement perform switch.

* Fix cast.

* Reorganize write.

* Remove creating tmp variable in perform switch.

* Set gripper joint name to empty.

* Remove redundant conditions.
